bio.experienceSummary:
As a dedicated and experienced childcare provider, I am passionate about fostering the growth and development of children. With over a decade of experience caring for children of all ages, I have honed my skills and abilities to create a safe, nurturing, and stimulating environment for kids to thrive.

My patient, calm, and creative personality allows me to connect with children on a personal level, understanding their needs and interests. I believe in open and honest communication with parents, providing regular updates and following their preferred communication methods to ensure a seamless partnership.

I am comfortable enforcing household rules while also respecting the parents' guidelines and expectations. My approach to play and activities includes a mix of outdoor sports, board games, and educational games that promote learning and development.

I hold a graduate degree and am a certified registered nurse, with additional training in First Aid and CPR.

description.originalText: Otteline is an amazing babysitter. Always on time and super passionate about her work and caretaking. We loved having her around and the kids are super excited every time she comes over!

bio.experienceSummary:
I am a compassionate and dedicated professional with a Bachelor's degree . I have built a career focused on caregiving and education, currently working as a caretaker and assistant. I am in the process of applying for a Master's degree in Early Childhood Psychology, driven by my passion for supporting children's development and well-being.

I bring specialized experience in working with children on the autism spectrum, including RBT training, and have a strong foundation in education, .,

In addition to my professional expertise, I have a deep appreciation for the arts, literature, music, and photography. I am multilingual, fluent in English and Portuguese, proficient in Spanish at an intermediate level, and currently learning German to expand my language skills.

description.displayText: Rafaela was our full-time nanny for a year and a half and still would be if she didn't leave us for New York. There's lots of wonderful childcare workers in the world, but Rafaela, if you're lucky enough to work with her, is something truly special. My children adore her, still talk about her, and my baby starts kicking frantically and yelling at the screen when we video chat with her. LA's loss is NYC's gain, for sure.
description.originalText: Rafaela was our full-time nanny for a year and a half and still would be if she didn't leave us for New York. There's lots of wonderful childcare workers in the world, but Rafaela, if you're lucky enough to work with her, is something truly special. My children adore her, still talk about her, and my baby starts kicking frantically and yelling at the screen when we video chat with her. LA's loss is NYC's gain, for sure.

bio.experienceSummary:
Hi there, my name is Madeline and I am offering childcare and tutoring services. I moved to New York City two months ago from San Francisco where I consistently babysat for families in my neighborhood. For my full time remote job, I work as a consultant in biotech after graduating from UC Berkley in 2021 with a degree in molecular environmental biology. 

I'm originally from Sacramento, California where I gained most of my experience working with children as a camp counselor. I spent five summers working full-time with children ages 3 to 12 years old and engaging them in activities, games and imagination based adventures. I've also babysit infants, toddlers, and kids since I was 14 years old.

In addition, I am comfortable tutoring children of all ages through high school. I was my high school valedictorian and have maintained a solid understanding of high school curriculum as I have tutored my younger brothers and their friends. Please feel free to reach out - thank you!

description.originalText: Madeline was wonderful. She watched our 2 girls for a date night while we were traveling and she was great with them.

bio.experienceSummary:
I am currently pursuing a Master's degree in art therapy. I have previous experience working in the infant and toddler rooms of a preschool, an elementary school, as well as a school for neurodivergent children ages 4-21.

I'm known for my calm and patient demeanor, which puts children at ease. With my creative and imaginative nature, I love planning fun and educational activities that cater to each child's interests and developmental needs. Open communication is important to me; I provide regular updates to parents about their child's day and am always available to discuss any concerns or questions they may have.

Whether it's engaging in arts and crafts or helping with homework, I am passionate about making every moment a joyful and enriching experience for the children in my care. I'm dedicated to helping your children reach their full potential and am excited to be a part of their growth journey.

Hello! I'm Tessa, and I have a deep passion for nurturing children and supporting families.

With a B. S. in Health & Nutrition Sciences and over a decade of childcare experience, I have worked with children of all ages, from newborns to adolescents. 

My responsibilities included meal preparation, organizing playdates, assisting with homework, managing bedtime routines, diaper changes, feedings, bathing, and more.

In 2019, I expanded my love for supporting families by becoming a certified Holistic Doula, specializing in fertility, labor, lactation, and postpartum care. I'm also CPR certified, fully vaccinated, and planning to further my education by pursuing a career in Nursing. 

I'm committed to providing a safe, caring, and fun environment for every child. References are available upon request, and I look forward to the opportunity to support your family!

description.originalText: Tessa is amazing! As new parents we were reluctant to go online and select a complete stranger to watch our 4 month old but we are so glad we found Tessa here on Care. She very naturally took to our baby, and him to her, and we have hired for daytime, date nights and overnights. Highly recommend Tessa!

bio.experienceSummary:
Hi all! I'm a nanny currently living in Lower Manhattan and seeking a full-time, live-out position.

I double-majored in Spanish and Economics and after graduation moved to Murcia, Spain to teach English to children ages 3-12. I started babysitting at 13, was an au pair in Madrid in 2019, and spent the last year nannying for a wonderful family in Charleston, SC.

I have experience with children of all ages and I am comfortable caring for siblings.
I emphasize routine building, fostering responsibility, kindness, and adaptability. I love keeping things creative and engaging for kids and advocate for a screen-free environment, focusing on enriching activities away from TVs and tablets. I'm pet-friendly, tidy, organized, and happy to assist with household chores. 

I'd love to discuss how I can support your family. Looking for a family with a reasonable commute from Lower Manhattan. Feel free to message me with any questions! Happy to provide references + a resume upon request!

description.displayText:
I am delighted to write this letter of recommendation for Anne T. M. Over the past year, Anne Thomas has provided exceptional care for my son and daughter, ages 4 and 2. I am confident in her ability to offer the same level of care and attention to
others.

From the beginning, Anne T. has demonstrated remarkable reliability,
professionalism, and a genuine affection for my children. Her ability to engage with them through creative play, educational activities, and consistent routines has been truly
impressive. One of the many aspects we have loved was her willingness to get the children outdoors. Walks, trips to the playground, or an outing to an activity were a daily occurrence.

Anne T. consistently demonstrated punctuality and reliability, always arriving as scheduled and ready to engage. She frequently kept the children for date nights, occasional overnight or weekend stays, and even provided home and pet care for our
dog when we were away.

What stands out most about Anne T. is her calm and patient demeanor. She was able to handle challenging situations with grace and patience. Whether it’s managing a
tantrum or assisting with potty training, she approaches each situation with a positive attitude and effective solutions.

I have always felt at ease knowing that my children are in such capable hands. I
wholeheartedly recommend Anne T. for any babysitting position. Her dedication, kindness, and skill make her an outstanding choice for anyone seeking a dependable and caring caregiver for their children.

bio.experienceSummary: 8 years of experience taking care of newborns to 11-year-olds as well as elderly care. I am responsible, reliable and cheerful person with excellent childcare and interpersonal skills. I also work as a private chef and caterer and will happily help with meal prep in the house along with dinners. I am always filled with energy and love engaging children in various creative activities as well as help with any kind of school work they receive. I have experience with taking care of multiple children at once and am never overwhelmed by a challenge. I also love pets and happy to work with any furry family members. I am very flexible with hours and do not mind last minute calls - vaccinated and willing to travel.

description.displayText: Katya was punctual, reliable, and very helpful. Proactive and resourceful. Would definitely hire again.
description.originalText: Katya was punctual, reliable, and very helpful. Proactive and resourceful. Would definitely hire again.

bio.experienceSummary:
I am a teacher, and while my first language is Spanish, I am very fluent in English. I have experience working with children both professionally and personally, as I have been a nanny for over five years. Additionally, I have volunteered with children with special needs. I am comfortable caring for newborns, toddlers, and older children.

I would describe myself as responsible and patient. I enjoy outdoor activities and learning about different cultures. I also love pets and helping others.

I would be more than happy to share more about myself with you!

Hi! 

I'm an experienced NYC nanny currently working with multiple families on the UES and UWS of NYC and am looking for more hours. 

I handle school pick-ups, after-school activities, meal prep, light housekeeping, and love teaching children Spanish in a fun, natural way. With a Bachelor's degree, more than four years in corporate banking, fluency in English and Spanish, and a genuine passion for childcare, I bring warmth, structure, and creativity to each family. 

Glowing References and contact information available upon request!

description.originalText: Sabrina is my regular afterschool sitter, she watches my 2 boys, age 8 and 10. She’s been amazing with them, she’s young and energetic, extremely responsible, very communicative, and has a lot of fun with my kids, they’re always excited to see her.  She has a BS degree, speaks Spanish, and has 4 years of child care experience.  I highly recommend her.

bio.experienceSummary:
I'm an educated, single, very active and fit caregiver who has graduated from top schools. I do not have children or pets and am looking mostly for on call, travel nanny or full-time work. Free time is spent leading a very healthy lifestyle cooking mostly organic whole foods, reading, exercising, attending different shows and spending time at parks, museums and cultural exhibits and also traveling and volunteering. 

I have teaching experience and extensive experience working as an on call nanny, travel nanny, baby nurse and full-time nanny in recent years and also as a babysitter throughout grade school, high school and college. I also have experience working at day care centers (for adults and for children). I can send my resume, letters of recommendation and a NY police check to you.

description.originalText: Camille has been an absolute lifesaver for our family. Camille has babysitting our boy over the last year, since when he was 4 months old. Camille's reliability and professionalism are outstanding, and her natural ability to connect with our baby is truly heartwarming. Camille's attentiveness and genuine concern make us feel at ease even when we are away. We can't thank her enough and she's been an essential part of our family support system.
